summary: This document is an email chain from October 2020 between a paralegal and an FBI contact discussing scheduling an interview for a victim of Jeffrey Epstein. The paralegal is seeking FBI assistance for the victim's therapy expenses and coordinating her statement.

persons.name: Kelljchian
persons.context: Paralegal at Edwards Pottinger LLC who is communicating with an FBI contact to schedule an interview for a victim and seek assistance with therapy expenses.

persons.name: Henderson
persons.context: CC'd on emails regarding coordinating an interview for an Epstein victim and FBI assistance with therapy expenses.

connections.description: Paralegal communicating with FBI contact to coordinate victim interview and seek assistance.

events.title: Email Coordination for Victim Interview
events.description: Paralegal follows up about scheduling an interview for an Epstein victim, noting Tuesday is the best day.

events.title: Initial Request for FBI Assistance
events.description: Paralegal contacts FBI to seek assistance for a victim's therapy expenses and offers to coordinate her statement.

keyFacts: A victim of Jeffrey Epstein is seeking FBI assistance to cover therapy expenses, with her counselor agreeing to wait for payment.
The victim resides in Ohio but is identified as a Florida victim, indicating the crimes may have occurred in Florida.
The FBI case agent is coordinating an interview with the victim, showing ongoing investigation activities in 2020.
Communication is between a paralegal at Edwards Pottinger LLC and FBI contacts, highlighting legal coordination for victim support.
